errors.commandgeneric: An error occured while attempting to execute this command. Please report this to a developer.
errors.commandoutsideguild: This command must be used in a Discord server!
errors.hasntplayed: You have not played Yorkle #{day} yet! Use `/yorkle` to solve today's puzzle to share your results!
errors.invalidguess:
Unknown song "{guess}"
Try checking for spelling mistakes, or try another song. Answers are not case or punctuation dependent.
errors.lastclip: Unable to skip clip {clip}, this is my final clip! Make a guess using the `/guess` command!
errors.noguess: `/guess` command must include a guessed song! Try the `/skip` command if you're stuck!
errors.noguild: This guild is not yet connected to Yorkle! Play a game of `/yorkle` and share the results to this guild with the `/share` command to connect it!
errors.nosession: You must have an open session of Yorkle to use this command! Use `/yorkle` to start playing!
errors.playedtoday: You have already played today's puzzle! Come back tomorrow to play again!
errors.repeatguess: You have already guessed "{guess}". Try guessing another song.
errors.sessioncollision: You already have an open session of Yorkle.
